name: Swatchtastic
sizes_available: finished flag measure about 7-8" across the top
suggested_yarn: Any gauge - designed for any gauge ?
full_text: Swatchtastic - by Tin Can Knits I love making swatches! You may not feel the same, but with this quick and easy pattern, you can create a nice tidy stack, all while testing out the yarn for your project. At the end of the year you will be ready to make a pretty garland of swatch bunting to decorate your craft room, child’s room, or to have on hand for parties! Swatchtastic is the free pattern from our book, Mad Colour. You can check out all of the fab and fun designs here . Like our knits? Get our email updates to hear about new designs, tutorials and subscriber-only special offers! Pattern Info Sizing Your finished size may vary, but for useful data about finished gauge, follow the pattern to make triangles that measure 7-8” across the top. Yarn Any yarn! These swatches are designed to try out new yarns and colour combinations Needles Any needles! You may find you need to try a few different needle sizes before you achieve the pattern gauge Gauge Aim to achieve pattern gauge Notions darning needle, crochet hook if desired (for attaching bunting together) For all pattern abbreviations, techniques, and to contact us, visit www.tincanknits.com
